pages.text: I soobshchi im, chto voda podelena mezhdu nimi: kazhdoye pit'ye v svoye vremya
I vozzvali oni k svoyemu priyatelyu, i tot vzyal i ubil
Kakovo zhe bylo Moye nakazaniye i uveshchaniye
Vot, My poslali na nikh yedinyy vopl', i oni stali, kak trava stroitelya ograd
I My oblegchili Koran dlya pominaniya, no naydetsya li khot' odin pripominayushchiy
Narod Luta schel lozh'yu uveshchaniye
Vot, poslali na nikh vikhr', nesushchiy kamni, krome sem'i Luta, - ikh My spasli na zare
po milosti ot Nas. Tak vozdayem My tem, kto blagodaren
On uveshcheval ikh o Nashey moshchi, no oni somnevalis' v uveshchaniyakh
Oni otvlekali yego ot gostey, i My izgladili ikh ochi. Vkusite zhe Moye nakazaniye i uveshchaniye
I utrom porazilo ikh nakazaniye utverdivsheyesya
Vkusite zhe Moye nakazaniye i uveshchaniye
I My oblegchili Koran dlya pominaniya, no naydetsya li khot' odin pripominayushchiy
Prishli k rodu Firauna uveshchaniya
Oni sochli lozh'yu vse Nashi znameniya, i My skhvatili ikh khvatkoy velikogo, moguchego
Vashi li nevernyye luchshe, chem vot eti, ili u vas yest' okhrannaya gramota v pisanii
Mozhet, oni skazhut: "My - vmeste vse pomoshchniki
Obratitsya v begstvo sborishche, i povernut oni tyl
Da, tot chas - ikh naznacheniye, i tot chas - uzhasneye i gorche
Ved' greshniki - v zabluzhdenii i bezumii
v tot den', kogda potashchat ikh na litsakh v ogon'. Vkusite prikosnoveniye sakara
Poistine, My ved' vsyakuyu veshch' sotvorili po mere
